items.ja: King and Walcott on pressure of breaking into first-team football
items.en: King and Walcott on pressure of breaking into first-team football
items.text_for_match: King and Walcott on pressure of breaking into first-team football Fulham's Josh King and former England and Arsenal winger Theo Walcott open up on the challenges of breaking into first-team football. Fulham's Josh King and former England and Arsenal winger Theo Walcott open up on the challenges of breaking into first-team football.

items.ja: Is Spurs' Moore the answer to Rangers' open-play issues?
items.en: Is Spurs' Moore the answer to Rangers' open-play issues?
items.text_for_match: Is Spurs' Moore the answer to Rangers' open-play issues? Consistency is the next step for Rangers winger Mikey Moore after a standout performance against Kilmarnock, says head coach Danny Rohl. Consistency is the next step for Rangers winger Mikey Moore after a standout performance against Kilmarnock, says head coach Danny Rohl.
